patch:
@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@ on:
 
 jobs:
   deploy_binaries:
-    name: Deploy release binaries
+    name: Deploy release Windows and Linux binaries
     runs-on: ubuntu-20.04
     steps:
         - name: Install metacity window manager for background tests
@@ -30,7 +30,42 @@ jobs:
         - name: Release assets on GitHub
           uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v0.1.5
           with:
-            files: releng/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.product/target/products/hexatomic-*.zip
+            files: |
+              releng/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.product/target/products/hexatomic-*-linux.gtk.x86_64.zip
+              releng/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.product/target/products/hexatomic-*-win32.win32.x86_64.zip  
+            draft: true
+          env:
+            GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
+  deploy_macos:
+    name: Deploy release MacOS binaries
+    runs-on: macos-10.15
+    steps:
+        - name: Checkout
+          uses: actions/checkout@v2
+        - name: Set JAVA_HOME to OpenJDK 11
+          run: echo JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME_11_X64 >> $GITHUB_ENV
+        - name: Run Maven install (includes tests)
+          run: mvn clean install
+          env:
+            LANG: en_US.UTF-8
+        - name: Update CFF file
+          run: mvn -f ./features/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic/pom.xml cff:create
+          env:
+            LANG: en_US.UTF-8
+        - name: Build again with updated CFF file
+          run: mvn clean verify
+          env:
+            LANG: en_US.UTF-8
+        - name: Remove code sign from generated app folder
+          run: codesign --remove-signature releng/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.product/target/products/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.product/macosx/cocoa/x86_64/hexatomic.app
+        - name: Create zip file from app folder
+          run: zip -r hexatomic_unsigned.zip  releng/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.product/target/products/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.product/macosx/cocoa/x86_64/hexatomic.app/
+        - name: Replace macOS release asset with the unsigned zip file
+          run: mv hexatomic_unsigned.zip releng/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.product/target/products/hexatomic-*-macosx.cocoa.x86_64.zip
+        - name: Release assets on GitHub
+          uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v0.1.5
+          with:
+            files: releng/org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.product/target/products/hexatomic-*-macosx.cocoa.x86_64.zip
             draft: true
           env:
             GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@ on: push
 
 jobs:
   test_jdk11:
-    name: OpenJDK 11 + SonarCloud code analysis
+    name: OpenJDK 11 Linux + SonarCloud code analysis
     runs-on: ubuntu-20.04
     steps:
       - name: Install metacity window manager for background tests
@@ -28,6 +28,25 @@ jobs:
           GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
           SONAR_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.SONAR_TOKEN }}
           LANG: en_US.UTF-8
+  test_macos:
+    name: OpenJDK 11 macOS
+    runs-on: macos-10.15
+    steps:
+      - name: Checkout
+        uses: actions/checkout@v2
+      - name: Cache local Maven repository
+        uses: actions/cache@v2
+        with:
+          path: ~/.m2/repository
+          key: ${{ runner.os }}-maven-11-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
+          restore-keys: |
+            ${{ runner.os }}-maven-11-
+      - name: Set JAVA_HOME to OpenJDK 11
+        run: echo JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME_11_X64 >> $GITHUB_ENV
+      - name: Run Maven install (includes tests)
+        run: mvn verify
+        env:
+          LANG: en_US.UTF-8
 
   test_docs:
     name: Test documentation

@@ -2,4 +2,5 @@ target/
 book/
 NOTES.md
 workspace/
-tests/**/Rerun*
\ No newline at end of file
+tests/**/Rerun*
+**/.DS_Store

@@ -38,5 +38,4 @@
             </plugin>
         </plugins>
     </build>
-
 </project>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -16,6 +16,7 @@
 		aggregated into a report project. Tell SonarCloud to use the aggregated data.
 		-->
 		<sonar.coverage.jacoco.xmlReportPaths>${basedir}/../../${aggregate.report.dir}</sonar.coverage.jacoco.xmlReportPaths>
+		<tycho-tests-jvmargs></tycho-tests-jvmargs>
 	</properties>
 
 	<modules>
@@ -27,4 +28,34 @@
 		<module>org.corpus_tools.hexatomic.tests.report</module>
 	</modules>
 
+	<profiles>
+    	<profile>
+            <id>macos</id>
+            <activation>
+                <os>
+                    <family>mac</family>
+                </os>
+            </activation>
+            <properties>
+                <tycho-tests-jvmargs>-XstartOnFirstThread -Dorg.eclipse.swt.internal.carbon.smallFonts</tycho-tests-jvmargs>
+            </properties>
+        </profile>
+    </profiles>
+
+	<build>
+		<pluginManagement>
+			<plugins>
+				<plugin>
+					<groupId>org.eclipse.tycho</groupId>
+					<artifactId>tycho-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
+					<version>${tycho.version}</version>
+					<configuration>
+						<!-- set a default argument line for all tycho surefire tests -->
+						<argLine>${tycho-tests-jvmargs}</argLine>
+					</configuration>
+				</plugin>
+			</plugins>
+		</pluginManagement>
+	</build>
+
 </project>
